history.proof: destruct (eq_nat_dec k 0) as [Hk|Hk]. - subst. qsimpl time: 1. - assert (Hk': k <> 0) by auto. clear Hk. qsimpl time: 1 use: le_lt_or_eq.

original: destruct (eq_nat_dec k 0) as [Hk|Hk]. - subst. rewrite Nat.mul_0_r in H1. exfalso. apply H3. symmetry. apply H1. - assert (Hk': k <> 0) by auto. clear Hk. apply le_lt_or_eq in Hk'. + destruct k. * exfalso. apply Hk'. reflexivity. * assert (Hl: l <> 0) by now apply Nat.neq_mul_0. auto.
